subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez homered against Curt Schilling in the fifth inning, breaking a tie and propelling the Yankees to a victory. It came a night after Rodriguez made two errors in an 11-run loss.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez homered against Curt Schilling in the fifth inning, breaking a tie and propelling the Yankees to a victory. It came a night after Rodriguez made two errors in an 11-run loss.
